blocks.name: cixp
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include infinite Cartesian products.

blocks.name: diff.cixp.s
diff.cixp.c
diff.cixp.w
df-ixp
blocks.content: Definition of infinite Cartesian product of [Enderton] p. 54. Enderton uses a bold "X" with ` x e. A ` written underneath or as a subscript, as does Stoll p. 47. Some books use a capital pi, but we will reserve that notation for products of numbers. Usually ` B ` represents a class expression containing ` x ` free and thus can be thought of as ` B ( x ) ` . Normally, ` x ` is not free in ` A ` , although this is not a requirement of the definition. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: dfixp
blocks.content: Eliminate the expression ` { x | x e. A } ` in ~ df-ixp , under the assumption that ` A ` and ` x ` are disjoint. This way, we can say that ` x ` is bound in ` X_ x e. A B ` even if it appears free in ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfixp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cab(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtri(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cab(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1)))), cab(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  df-ixp(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  abbii(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wfn(cv(s1), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1))))
  anbi1i(wfn(cv(s1), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c1)), wfn(cv(s1), c0))
  fneq2i(cv(s1), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c0)
  abid2(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: ixpsnval
blocks.content: The value of an infinite Cartesian product with a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 3-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpsnval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cixp(s0, csn(c0), c2), cab(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), csn(c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, c0, c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl5eq(cixp(s0, csn(c0), c2), cab(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), csn(c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, c0, c2)))), cab(s1, wa(wfn(cv(s1), csn(c0)), wral(s0, csn(c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  dfixp(s0, s1, csn(c0), c2)
  abbidv(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wfn(cv(s1), csn(c0)), wral(s0, csn(c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wfn(cv(s1), csn(c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, c0, c2))))
  anbi2d(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(cv(s1), csn(c0)), wral(s0, csn(c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, csn(c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)))
  ralsnsg(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(cv(s1), c0), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(csb(s0, c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0))), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  sbcel12(s0, c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), c2)
  eleq1d(csb(s0, c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0))), csb(s0, c0, c2), cfv(cv(s1), c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqtrd(csb(s0, c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cfv(cv(s1), c0), cfv(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, c1))
  csbfv2g(s0, c0, c1, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  fveq2d(cv(s1), csb(s0, c0, cv(s0)), c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  csbvarg(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixpsnval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí √ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c2)= { s1 |(s1[Fn]{ c0 } ‚àß(s1 ` c0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  syl5eq(√ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c2), { s1 |(s1[Fn]{ c0 } ‚àß(s1 ` c0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2)}, { s1 |(s1[Fn]{ c0 } ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0 },(s1 ` s0)‚àà c2))}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  dfixp(s0, s1, { c0 }, c2)
  abbidv(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, (s1[Fn]{ c0 } ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0 },(s1 ` s0)‚àà c2)), (s1[Fn]{ c0 } ‚àß(s1 ` c0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2))
  anbi2d(c0 ‚àà c1, s1[Fn]{ c0 }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0 },(s1 ` s0)‚àà c2), (s1 ` c0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2)
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { c0 },(s1 ` s0)‚àà c2), (s1 ` c0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0](s1 ` s0)‚àà c2)
  ralsnsg(s0, c0, c1, (s1 ` s0)‚àà c2)
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0](s1 ` s0)‚àà c2, (s1 ` c0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0](s1 ` s0)‚àà[c0 / s0]c2)
  sbcel12(s0, c0, (s1 ` s0), c2)
  eleq1d([c0 / s0](s1 ` s0), [c0 / s0]c2, (s1 ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  eqtrd([c0 / s0](s1 ` s0), (s1 ` c0), (s1 `[c0 / s0]s0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  csbfv2g(s0, c0, c1, s1, s0)
  fveq2d(s1, [c0 / s0]s0, c0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  csbvarg(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: elixp2
blocks.content: Membership in an infinite Cartesian product. See ~ df-ixp for discussion of the notation. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm elixp2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cixp(s0, c1, c2), wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  fneq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  eleq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  dfixp(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2))
  3anass(wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elixp2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4i(c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2)), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß(c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2))))
  pm5.32i(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2)))
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), (c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2)), (hs0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0[Fn]c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2), c0[Fn]c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2))
  fneq1(hs0, c0, c1)
  ralbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c0, (hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2, (c0 ` s0)‚àà c2)
  eleq1d((hs0 ` s0), c2, (c0 ` s0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, s0)
  dfixp(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  pm4.71ri(c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  3anass(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0[Fn]c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Fn]c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: fvixp
blocks.content: Projection of a factor of an indexed Cartesian product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jun-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvixp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(c0, c1))
  elixp2(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(s0, c1, c3, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), c4))
  eleq12d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, cfv(c0, c3), c4, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c3, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c0, c3), c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvixp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0 ` c3)‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = c3 ‚Üí c2 = c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), c3 ‚àà c1, (c0 ` c3)‚àà c4, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2))
  simp3bi(c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` s0)‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0[Fn]c1)
  elixp2(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(s0, c1, c3, (c0 ` s0)‚àà c2, (c0 ` c3)‚àà c4)
  eleq12d((c0 ` s0), c2, (c0 ` c3), c4, s0 = c3)
  fveq2(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` c3), c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c3)
}

blocks.name: ixpfn
blocks.content: A nuple is a function. (Contributed by FL, 6-Jun-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wfn(c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, cixp(s0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(cv(hs0), c1))
  fneq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  simp2bi(wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c1, c2)), wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)))
  elixp2(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cixp(s0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wfn(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixpfn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2)‚Üí c0[Fn]c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  vtoclga(hs0, c0, √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), c0[Fn]c1, hs0[Fn]c1)
  fneq1(hs0, c0, c1)
  simp2bi(hs0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2), hs0[Fn]c1, hs0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2))
  elixp2(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(√ó(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Fn]c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm ixpconstg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c2), co(c2, cmap, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c2), co(c2, cmap, c0)))
  syl6reqr(cixp(s0, c0, c2), co(c2, cmap, c0), cab(hs0, wf(cv(hs0), c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c1)))
  mapvalg(hs0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  abbi2i(hs0, cixp(s0, c0, c2), wf(cv(hs0), c0, c2))
  elixpconst(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cixp(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ixpconstg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)=(c2[‚Ü¶]c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c2)=(c2[‚Ü¶]c0))
  syl6reqr(√ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), (c2[‚Ü¶]c0), { hs0 |(hs0 : c0 ‚Üí c2)}, (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c1))
  mapvalg(hs0, c2, c3, c0, c1)
  abbi2i(hs0, √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c2), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üí c2))
  elixpconst(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(√ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ixpeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for infinite Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpeq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c2), cixp(s0, c1, c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cixp(s0, c0, c2), cixp(s0, c1, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)))), cab(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2))), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2))))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)), wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)))
  fneq2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  raleq(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2))
  dfixp(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  dfixp(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm ss2ixp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wss(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))
} = {
  3sstr4g(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))), cab(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)))), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  ss2abdv(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2))))
  anim2d(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)), wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2)))
  ral2imi(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c2))
  ssel(c1, c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  df-ixp(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-ixp(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

} = {

  anim2d(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2), hs0[Fn]{ s0 | s0 ‚àà c0 }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2))
  ral2imi(s0, c0, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (hs0 ` s0)‚àà c1, (hs0 ` s0)‚àà c2)

thm cbvixp(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s1, c0, c2), cab(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))), cab(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c2)))))
  abbii(hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1))), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c2))))
  anbi2i(wfn(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c2)))
  cbvral(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c2))
  nfel2(s1, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)
  nfel2(s0, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c2)
  eleq12d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  dfixp(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  dfixp(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  anbi2i(hs0[Fn]c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ` s0)‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,(hs0 ` s1)‚àà c2))
  cbvral(s0, s1, c0, (hs0 ` s0)‚àà c1, (hs0 ` s1)‚àà c2)
  nfel2(s1, (hs0 ` s0), c1)
  nfel2(s0, (hs0 ` s1), c2)
  eleq12d((hs0 ` s0), c1, (hs0 ` s1), c2, s0 = s1)
  fveq2(s0, s1, hs0)
  dfixp(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  dfixp(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, hs0, s0)

  |- wnfc(s0, cixp(s1, c0, c1))

} = {

  df-ixp(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfab(s0, hs0, wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  nfan(s0, wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  nffn(s0, cv(hs0), cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  mptru(wnfc(s0, cab(s1, wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  nfabd2(s0, s1, wtru, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  nfxfr(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1))))
  df-ral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1))
  mptru(wnf(s0, wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1)))))
  nfald2(s0, s1, wtru, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1)))
  nftru(s1)
  nfimd(s0, wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1))
  nfeld(s0, cv(s1), c0, wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnfc(s0, c0))
  nfeld(s0, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), c1, wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  nffvd(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1), wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnfc(s0, cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  adantl(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  a1i(wa(wtru, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wnfc(s0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ixpprc
blocks.content: A cartesian product of proper-class many sets is empty, because any function in the cartesian product has to be a set with domain ` A ` , which is not possible for a proper class domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpprc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  con1i(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))
  sylbi(wn(wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1))))
  neq0(hs0, cixp(s0, c0, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wfn(cv(hs0), c0))
  ixpfn(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)

  ralimia(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), ciun(s0, c1, c2)))
  sseld(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, ciun(s0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))

thm ixpiin(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: ixpint
blocks.content: The intersection of a collection of infinite Cartesian products. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpint(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cixp(s0, c1, cint(c0)), ciin(s1, c0, cixp(s0, c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl5eq(cixp(s0, c1, cint(c0)), ciin(s1, c0, cixp(s0, c1, cv(s1))), cixp(s0, c1, ciin(s1, c0, cv(s1))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  mprg(s0, c1, wceq(cixp(s0, c1, cint(c0)), cixp(s0, c1, ciin(s1, c0, cv(s1)))), wceq(cint(c0), ciin(s1, c0, cv(s1))))
  ixpeq2(s0, c1, cint(c0), ciin(s1, c0, cv(s1)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cint(c0), ciin(s1, c0, cv(s1))))
  intiin(s1, c0)
  ixpiin(s0, s1, c0, c1, cv(s1))
}

thm ixpssmap2g(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  mpbird(wa(wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), c0, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  adantl(wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c0, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  ixpf(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  sylan2(wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), c0, ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(c0, universe))
  nsyl2(wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))
  n0i(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1))
  ixpprc(s0, c0, c1)
  elmapg(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2, c0, universe, cv(hs0))

  diff.hs0.c(co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0))

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  sseldd(cv(hs0), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0), cixp(s0, c0, c1), wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1))))
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1))), wss(cixp(s0, c0, c1), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c0)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))

  nsyl2(wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {

  syl2anr(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà c2))
  nsyl2(hs0 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), c0 ‚àà ùïå, √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)= ‚àÖ)

blocks.name: 0elixp
blocks.content: Membership of the empty set in an infinite Cartesian product. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 29-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: ixpn0
blocks.content: The infinite Cartesian product of a family ` B ( x ) ` with an empty member is empty. The converse of this theorem is equivalent to the Axiom of Choice, see ~ ac9 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)))
} = {
  sylbi(wne(cixp(s0, c0, c1), emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1))))
  n0(hs0, cixp(s0, c0, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)))
  simplbiim(wcel(cv(hs0), cixp(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)), wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)))
  abeq2i(hs0, cixp(s0, c0, c1), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), cab(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1))))
  df-ixp(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  ralimi(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1), wne(c1, emptycls))
  ne0i(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cixp(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wne(c1, emptycls)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ixp0
blocks.content: The infinite Cartesian product of a family ` B ( x ) ` with an empty member is empty. The converse of this theorem is equivalent to the Axiom of Choice, see ~ ac9 . (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2016.)

blocks.name: ixpssmap
blocks.content: An infinite Cartesian product is a subset of set exponentiation. Remark in [Enderton] p. 54. (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: resixp
blocks.content: Restriction of an element of an infinite Cartesian product. (Contributed by FL, 7-Nov-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2014.)

thm resixp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wcel(cres(c2, c0), cixp(s0, c0, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wcel(cres(c2, c0), cixp(s0, c0, c3)), wcel(cres(c2, c0), universe), wfn(cres(c2, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cres(c2, c0), cv(s0)), c3)))
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3)), wcel(cres(c2, c0), universe))
  resexg(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3), c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wfn(cres(c2, c0), c0), wfn(c2, c1), wss(c0, c1))
  simp2d(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wfn(c2, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  fnssres(c2, c1, c0)
  sylibr(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cres(c2, c0), cv(s0)), c3)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  sylc(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  simpl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3)))
  simp3d(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c2, c1))
  sylib(wa(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3))), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wfn(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3)))
  simpr(wss(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, c1, c3)))
  elixp2(s0, c2, c1, c3)
  ssralv(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  ralbiia(s0, c0, wcel(cfv(cres(c2, c0), cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  eleq1d(cfv(cres(c2, c0), cv(s0)), c3, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  fvres(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  elixp2(s0, cres(c2, c0), c0, c3)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c2, c0)
}

  elixp2(s0, c2, c1, c3)

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà c0, c3)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà c3)))

blocks.name: resixpfo
blocks.content: Restriction of elements of an infinite Cartesian product creates a surjection, if the original Cartesian product is nonempty. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))))))), diffss(s0, s1))

  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))))), wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3), cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ixpeq1d(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3, csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  rexbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wceq(c2, csn(cop(c0, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq2d(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), csn(cop(c0, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  opeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3))
  rexlimivw(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  mpbiri(wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), universe))
  snex(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  eleq1(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), universe)
  vtoclbg(hs1, c2, universe, wcel(c2, cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c2, cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3))
  rexbidv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wceq(c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs1), c2, csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs1), cixp(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c3)), wrex(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wa(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wral(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), c3))), wa(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3)))
  elixp(s0, cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0)), c3)
  vex(hs1)

  ralsn(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), c3), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3))

  sylib(wa(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))), wf(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0)), c3))
  sylanbrc(wa(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3)), wf(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0)), c3), wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, csn(cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), c3)))
  simpl(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3))
  adantl(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3), wral(s1, csn(cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), c3)))
  biimpri(wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3), wral(s1, csn(cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), c3)))
  ralsn(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), c3), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3))
  eleq1d(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), c3, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  ffnfv(s1, cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0)), c3)

  sneqd(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(hs0), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))
  opeq2(cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  rexlimiv(s1, c3, wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wa(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wa(wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3)), wa(wfn(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)), c3)))

  syl5eqel(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)), c3, cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wfn(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c3), wfn(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cv(hs0)), c3))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c2 = { < c0, s1 > })))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)

} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c3)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c2 = { < c0, s1 > }))), d(s0, s1))

  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c2 = { < c0, s1 > }), c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c2 = { < hs0, s1 > }))
  eleq2d(c2, √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3), √ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c3), hs0 = c0)

  sneq(hs0, c0)

  elex(c2, √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3))
  rexlimivw(s1, c3, c2 = { < hs0, s1 > }, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpbiri(c2 = { < hs0, s1 > }, c2 ‚àà ùïå, { < hs0, s1 > } ‚àà ùïå)
  snex(< hs0, s1 >)
  eleq1(c2, { < hs0, s1 > }, universe)
  vtoclbg(hs1, c2, universe, c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c2 = { < hs0, s1 > }), hs1 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }))
  eleq1(hs1, c2, √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3))
  rexbidv(s1, c3, hs1 = c2, hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }, c2 = { < hs0, s1 > })
  eqeq1(hs1, c2, { < hs0, s1 > })
  3bitri(hs1 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }), (hs1[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { hs0 },(hs1 ` s0)‚àà c3)), (hs1[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß(hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3))
  elixp(s0, hs1, { hs0 }, c3)
  vex(hs1)
  anbi2i(hs1[Fn]{ hs0 }, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { hs0 },(hs1 ` s0)‚àà c3), (hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3)

  syl((hs1[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß(hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }), ((hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 = { < hs0,(hs1 ` hs0)> }))
  sylib((hs1[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß(hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3), ((hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3 ‚àß hs1 = { < hs0,(hs1 ` hs0)> }), (hs1 : { hs0 } ‚Üí c3))

  biimpri((hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà { hs0 },(hs1 ` s1)‚àà c3))
  ralsn(s1, hs0, (hs1 ` s1)‚àà c3, (hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3)
  eleq1d((hs1 ` s1), c3, (hs1 ` hs0), s1 = hs0)
  fveq2(s1, hs0, hs1)
  ffnfv(s1, hs1, { hs0 }, c3)
  fsn2(hs1, hs0, c3)
  rspceeqv(s1, (hs1 ` hs0), c3, hs1, { < hs0,(hs1 ` hs0)> }, { < hs0, s1 > })
  sneqd(< hs0, s1 >, < hs0,(hs1 ` hs0)>, s1 =(hs1 ` hs0))
  opeq2(s1, (hs1 ` hs0), hs0)
  rexlimiv(s1, c3, hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }, (hs1[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß(hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3))
  syl5ibrcom(s1 ‚àà c3, hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }, (hs1[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß(hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3), ({ < hs0, s1 > }[Fn]{ hs0 } ‚àß({ < hs0, s1 > } ` hs0)‚àà c3))
  jctil(s1 ‚àà c3, { < hs0, s1 > }[Fn]{ hs0 }, ({ < hs0, s1 > } ` hs0)‚àà c3)
  syl5eqel(({ < hs0, s1 > } ` hs0), c3, s1, s1 ‚àà c3)
  fvsn(hs0, s1)
  id(s1 ‚àà c3)
  fnsn(hs0, s1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(s1)
  anbi12d(hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > }, hs1[Fn]{ hs0 }, (hs1 ` hs0)‚àà c3, { < hs0, s1 > }[Fn]{ hs0 }, ({ < hs0, s1 > } ` hs0)‚àà c3)
  fneq1(hs1, { < hs0, s1 > }, { hs0 })
  eleq1d((hs1 ` hs0), c3, ({ < hs0, s1 > } ` hs0), hs1 = { < hs0, s1 > })
  fveq1(hs1, { < hs0, s1 > }, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { c0 }, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c3, c2 = { < c0, s1 > }))
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(c2 ‚àà √ó(s0 ‚àà { hs0 }, c3))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: ixpsnf1o
blocks.content: A bijection between a class and single-point functions to it. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixpsnf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c3, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, c3, cxp(csn(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c3, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf1o(c2, c3, cixp(s0, csn(c0), c3))), diffsc(s0, c2))

blocks.name: mapsnf1o
blocks.content: A bijection between a set and single-point functions to it. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

thm mapsnf1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf1o(c4, c0, co(c0, cmap, csn(c2)))), diffsc(s0, c1))

  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmap, csn(c2)), cixp(hs0, csn(c2), c0)), wcel(csn(c2), universe))
  snex(c2)
  eqcomd(co(c0, cmap, csn(c2)), cixp(hs0, csn(c2), c0), wa(wcel(csn(c2), universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  ixpconstg(hs0, csn(c2), universe, c0, c1)

blocks.name: boxcutc
blocks.content: The relative complement of a box set restricted on one axis. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
